Question: Infineon Technologies Americas Corp. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Infineon Technologies Americas Corp.

Product: Predictive Safety Maintenance Solution

- AI-based solutions for improved long-term reliability and safety of automotive components
- Utilizes Aurora Labs’ Line-of-Code Intelligence (LOCI) AI technology on Infineon’s 32-bit TriCore AURIX TC4x family of microcontrollers
- Real-time monitoring and response to software failures at MCU- and ECU-level
- Protects applications and over-the-air updates to prevent malicious attacks and hardware safety failure
- AURIX TC4x family of MCUs designed for eMobility, ADAS, automotive E/E architectures, and AI applications
- AI- and ML-based features implemented in the AURIX TC4x PPU for automotive safety and security
- Available now

For more information, visit https://www.infineon.com/cms/en/partners/design-partners/aurora-labs/
Summary_cn:
英飞凌技术美洲公司

产品：预测性安全维护解决方案

- 基于人工智能的解决方案，提高汽车部件的长期可靠性和安全性
- 利用Aurora Labs的Line-of-Code Intelligence (LOCI)人工智能技术在英飞凌的32位TriCore AURIX TC4x系列微控制器上运行
- 实时监控和响应MCU和ECU级别的软件故障
- 保护应用程序和通过空中更新防止恶意攻击和硬件安全故障
- AURIX TC4x系列微控制器专为eMobility、ADAS、汽车电子/电气架构和人工智能应用而设计
- 基于人工智能和机器学习的功能应用于AURIX TC4x PPU，用于汽车安全和安全性
- 现已上市

欲了解更多信息，请访问https://www.infineon.com/cms/en/partners/design-partners/aurora-labs/
